verses.verse: Awake <S%H5782><s%>, awake <S%H5782><s%>; put on <S%H3847><s%> thy strength <S%H5797><s%>, O Zion <S%H6726><s%>; put on <S%H3847><s%> thy beautiful <S%H8597><s%> garments <S%H899><s%>, O Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>, the holy <S%H6944><s%> city <S%H5892><s%>: for henceforth there shall no more <S%H3254><s%> come <S%H935><s%> into thee the uncircumcised <S%H6189><s%> and the unclean <S%H2931><s%>.

Shake <S%H5287><s%> thyself from the dust <S%H6083><s%>; arise <S%H6965><s%>, and sit down <S%H3427><s%>, O Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>: loose <S%H6605><s%> thyself from the bands <S%H4147><s%> of thy neck <S%H6677><s%>, O captive <S%H7628><s%> daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Zion <S%H6726><s%>.
For thus saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, Ye have sold <S%H4376><s%> yourselves for nought <S%H2600><s%>; and ye shall be redeemed <S%H1350><s%> without money <S%H3701><s%>.

For thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>, My people <S%H5971><s%> went down <S%H3381><s%> aforetime <S%H7223><s%> into Egypt <S%H4714><s%> to sojourn <S%H1481><s%> there; and the Assyrian <S%H804><s%> oppressed <S%H6231><s%> them without cause <S%H657><s%>.

Now therefore, what have I here, saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, that my people <S%H5971><s%> is taken away <S%H3947><s%> for nought <S%H2600><s%>? they that rule <S%H4910><s%> over them make them to howl <S%H3213><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>; and my name <S%H8034><s%> continually <S%H8548><s%> every day <S%H3117><s%> is blasphemed <S%H5006><s%>.
Therefore my people <S%H5971><s%> shall know <S%H3045><s%> my name <S%H8034><s%>: therefore they shall know in that day <S%H3117><s%> that I am he that doth speak <S%H1696><s%>: behold, it is I.

¶ How beautiful <S%H4998><s%> upon the mountains <S%H2022><s%> are the feet <S%H7272><s%> of him that bringeth good tidings <S%H1319><s%>, that publisheth <S%H8085><s%> peace <S%H7965><s%>; that bringeth good tidings <S%H1319><s%> of good <S%H2896><s%>, that publisheth <S%H8085><s%> salvation <S%H3444><s%>; that saith <S%H559><s%> unto Zion <S%H6726><s%>, Thy God <S%H430><s%> reigneth <S%H4427><s%>!

Thy watchmen <S%H6822><s%> shall lift up <S%H5375><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%>; with the voice <S%H6963><s%> together <S%H3162><s%> shall they sing <S%H7442><s%>: for they shall see <S%H7200><s%> eye <S%H5869><s%> to eye <S%H5869><s%>, when the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall bring again <S%H7725><s%> Zion <S%H6726><s%>.

¶ Break forth into joy <S%H6476><s%>, sing <S%H7442><s%> together <S%H3162><s%>, ye waste places <S%H2723><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>: for the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath comforted <S%H5162><s%> his people <S%H5971><s%>, he hath redeemed <S%H1350><s%> Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>.

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath made bare <S%H2834><s%> his holy <S%H6944><s%> arm <S%H2220><s%> in the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of all the nations <S%H1471><s%>; and all the ends <S%H657><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> shall see <S%H7200><s%> the salvation <S%H3444><s%> of our God <S%H430><s%>.

¶ Depart <S%H5493><s%> ye, depart <S%H5493><s%> ye, go ye out <S%H3318><s%> from thence, touch <S%H5060><s%> no unclean <S%H2931><s%> thing; go ye out <S%H3318><s%> of the midst <S%H8432><s%> of her; be ye clean <S%H1305><s%>, that bear <S%H5375><s%> the vessels <S%H3627><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.

For ye shall not go out <S%H3318><s%> with haste <S%H2649><s%>, nor go <S%H3212><s%> by flight <S%H4499><s%>: for the LORD <S%H3068><s%> will go <S%H1980><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you; and the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> will be your rereward <S%H622><s%>.
¶ Behold, my servant <S%H5650><s%> shall deal prudently <S%H7919><s%>, he shall be exalted <S%H7311><s%> and extolled <S%H5375><s%>, and be very <S%H3966><s%> high <S%H1361><s%>.

As many <S%H7227><s%> were astonied <S%H8074><s%> at thee; his visage <S%H4758><s%> was so marred <S%H4893><s%> more than any man <S%H376><s%>, and his form <S%H8389><s%> more than the sons <S%H1121><s%> of men <S%H120><s%>:

So shall he sprinkle <S%H5137><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%>; the kings <S%H4428><s%> shall shut <S%H7092><s%> their mouths <S%H6310><s%> at him: for that which had not been told <S%H5608><s%> them shall they see <S%H7200><s%>; and that which they had not heard <S%H8085><s%> shall they consider <S%H995><s%>.
